results.overview: A senior at an ivy league college, who depends on scholarships and working on the side, gets accepted into the secret society The Skulls. He hopes it betters chances at Harvard but The Skulls is not what he thought and comes at a price.
results.title: The Skulls

results.overview: After joining the Skulls, Ryan Sommers (Robin Dunne) is warned not to betray any secrets about the organization or its high-powered members. However, when Ryan witnesses a murder within the Skulls' private chambers, he finds that the closer he gets to revealing the truth - the more dangerous life becomes.
results.title: The Skulls II

results.overview: A young college co-ed tries joining the elite, all-male, secret society, the Skulls, and in so doing, she uncovers some unscrupulous methods used by some of the members to get what they want.
results.title: The Skulls III

results.original_title: The Skulls: Night of the Living Skulls
results.overview: Music & Musicals, Punk Rock, Rock & Pop - Old-school punk band The Skulls rev it up in this live concert (filmed in its entirety) at the El Ray Theater in Los Angeles. One of the original bands to come up out of the legendary L.A. punk scene, The Skulls have remained an important part of punk's history. Features interviews with the band, street interviews and random footage of the band on the road.
results.title: The Skulls: Night of the Living Skulls

results.overview: In the city of Bronston, staying alive is a twenty four hour job... A wild bunch of hooligan kids who call themselves the Red Skulls have been the dominant street gang in the city for years. But everything changes one night when Uri, the leader of the Skulls, sees his best friend hacked to pieces by a rival group. Uri decides to get out of Bronston before he shares his friend's same fate. The only problem is the rest of the gang doesn't plan on letting him out so easy. The new self-appointed leader, Lester, has set a trap to lure Uri back, but without Uri in charge, all is not well within the gang's ranks. A traitorous member has set a trap of his own for Lester and the rest of the Red Skulls are about to become the victims. Now, Uri is about to find out the only thing more dangerous than a backstabbing street gang... is a mutated, cannibalistic street gang!
results.title: The Red Skulls

results.original_title: The Four Skulls of Jonathan Drake
results.overview: Jonathan Drake, while attending his brother's funeral, is shocked to find the head of the deceased is missing. When his brother's skull shows up later in a locked cabinet, Drake realizes an ancient curse placed upon his grandfather by a tribe of South American Jivaro Indians is still in effect and that he himself is the probable next victim.
results.title: The Four Skulls of Jonathan Drake

results.original_title: Allan Quatermain and the Temple of Skulls
results.overview: Filmed on location in South Africa, a retelling of H. Rider Haggard's classic novel "King Solomon's Mines," featuring the adventurer who was the inspiration for Indiana Jones.
results.title: Allan Quatermain and the Temple of Skulls

results.overview: One of archaeology's most compelling mysteries is that of the 13 crystal skulls. The crystal skulls have been some of the most powerful mystical symbols in human history. Several "perfect" crystal skulls have been found in parts of Mexico and Central and South America. Together, they form a mystery as enigmatic as the Great Pyramids and Stonehenge.
results.title: Mystery of the Crystal Skulls

results.original_title: The Mystery of the Roman Skulls
results.overview: Archeologists have uncovered an ancient mystery beneath the city of modern London: hundreds of skulls from more than 2000 years ago. Setting the scene of Roman history, Mystery of the Roman Skulls investigates the leading historical theories of who the victims were and why were they beheaded.
results.title: The Mystery of the Roman Skulls

results.overview: This Spanish language film was produced simultaneously with the filming of the two English language Laurel and Hardy shorts Be Big! and Laughing Gravy. The two shorts were edited together into one continuous film. Laurel and Hardy read their lines from cue cards on which Spanish was written phonetically. At the time of early talkies, dubbing was not yet perfected.
results.title: The Skulls

results.overview: Episodic film in which a masked hero combats a trio of classic monsters.
results.title: The Rider of the Skulls

results.overview: Moira Cole attempts to move on with her shattered life after the brutal murder of her friends and family at the hands of her deranged and obsessed cousin, Lee Morris. Living a quiet suburban life with her deeply affected two adult sons, Moira Cole is constantly reminded of her past, which is strewn across the screen every October, having been optioned into an incredibly popular horror franchise.
results.title: The Skulleton

results.overview: Felix the Cat is walking along when he is abruptly blindfolded and subjected to an elaborate ordeal which turns out to be (as the title hints) a fraternal initiation.
results.title: Skulls and Sculls
